edu.uchsc.ccp.testing
Class InputOutputTest

java.lang.Object
  edu.uchsc.ccp.testing.Test
      edu.uchsc.ccp.testing.InputOutputTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
LoveHateTester, ParserTest, PatternRuleTest, PatternTest
public abstract class InputOutputTest
extends Test

An InputOutputTest is a test that expects one input string and generates a set of output strings. The test succeeds if all of the output strings are generated when the input is processed and no additional output results.

This class must be further specialized by adding a runTest method which will be called to actually process the input and generate the output strings.

Author:
R. James Firby
